parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To expect, wait for, await, think, anticipate. From pros and dokeuo; to anticipate; by implication, to await.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A strengthened form of melo; to intend, i.e. Be about to be, do, or suffer something.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: To fill full of. I swell, am inflamed.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
Suddenly. Adverb from aphanes; unawares, i.e. Unexpectedly.
To fall down, fall prostrate. From kata and pipto; to fall down.
(a) adj: dead, lifeless, subject to death, mortal, (b) noun: a dead body, a corpse. From an apparently primary nekus; dead.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: To expect, wait for, await, think, anticipate. From pros and dokeuo; to anticipate; by implication, to await.
Much, many; often.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: From a derivative of theaomai; to be a spectator of, i.e. Discern, (experience) or intensively (acknowledge).
No one, none, nothing.
(lit: out of place, unusual, unbecoming), improper, unrighteous, perverse. Out of place, i.e. improper, injurious, wicked.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To change; mid: I change my mind. From meta and ballo; to throw over, i.e. to turn about in opinion.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
